name: Maria
review: With long battery life, a robust wireless connection, and 4K video, the DJI Mini 2 is the best drone I find for less than $500.

name: Henry
review: The product is very good and flies excellent indoors. Now when you want to take it flying outside please first verify where you live with DJI's geo System to avoid not being able to fly your drone.

name: Julia
review: Its awesome, super light. It comes with different cables for iPhone or android phones . The remote battery was pre-charged but the drone battery needed charging
